verses.text: \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy Creator \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* thy \w youth|strong="H0979"\w*, \w before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* affliction \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w draw|strong="H5060"\w* nigh \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w They|strong="H0834"\w* please \w me|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*:

\w Before|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w*:

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w keepers|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w tremble|strong="H2111"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w strong|strong="H2428"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* stagger, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* grinders \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w idle|strong="H0988"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* number, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w through|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* holes \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w darkened|strong="H2821"\w*:

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H7784"\w*, \w when|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* grinderâ€™s \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* shall \w be|strong="H6963"\w* \w low|strong="H8217"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* shall \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w at|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w music|strong="H7892"\w* shall grow deaf.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w* things, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w almond|strong="H8247"\w* \w tree|strong="H8247"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* flourish, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w locust|strong="H2284"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w made|strong="H5437"\w* fat, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* caper \w tree|strong="H8247"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H6565"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w eternity|strong="H5769"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w mourners|strong="H5594"\w* \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w round|strong="H5437"\w* \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w street|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w Before|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w cord|strong="H2256"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* fillet shrink \w back|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w pitcher|strong="H3537"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w crushed|strong="H7533"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* fountain, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w wheel|strong="H1534"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w cistern|strong="H0953"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* whence \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Vanity|strong="H1892"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w vanities|strong="H1892"\w*, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* Ecclesiastes, \w and|strong="H1892"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* are \w vanity|strong="H1892"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0853"\w* whereas Ecclesiastes \w was|strong="H1961"\w* very \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0853"\w* declared \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H0853"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w done|strong="H1961"\w*: \w and|strong="H0853"\w* seeking \w out|strong="H2713"\w*, \w he|strong="H0853"\w* set forth \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w parables|strong="H4912"\w*.

He \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* profitable \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* most \w right|strong="H0571"\w*, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* full \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* goads, \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* nails deeply \w fastened|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1697"\w*, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w by|strong="H1167"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w counsel|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w masters|strong="H1167"\w* \w are|strong="H1697"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H1697"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*.

\w More|strong="H0369"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w*, \w my|strong="H1320"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, require \w not|strong="H0369"\w*. \w Of|strong="H1121"\w* \w making|strong="H0369"\w* \w many|strong="H7235"\w* \w books|strong="H5612"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w end|strong="H7093"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w much|strong="H7235"\w* \w study|strong="H3854"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w an|strong="H0369"\w* affliction \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

Let \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* together \w the|strong="H3605"\w* conclusion \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* discourse. \w Fear|strong="H3372"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*:

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w done|strong="H4639"\w*, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* error, \w whether|strong="H0518"\w* \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.
